Episode.GuestStars: |Gary Kraus|Jeffrey Scott Kelly|Leon Simmons Jr.|Mark Rudy Rohde|Michael McDonald|Michael McMillian|Robert Pierce|Stephon Fuller|
Episode.Overview: J.D. and Turk go to a medical convention in Phoenix, Arizona, where they run into J.D.'s ex-girlfriend Dr. Kim Briggs, who has a surprise for J.D. Meanwhile at Sacred Heart, the janitor pretends to be the chief of medicine and Dr. Cox starts to put doubts about the wedding into Elliot's mind.
